page.title: 13Recreation - Wendron C.C.
page.content: Wendron Cricket Club was formed in 1945. Its clubhouse was opened in 1982 by Sadik Mohammed. Our managers are Clive Mitchell, Roland Tiplady and Dennis Floyd. Our clubhouse has a bar and two changing rooms. We have one practice net to practise our bowling and batting. We play for the Under-13 Team. The full team is* Gregory Floyd, Shaun Wright, Stephen Eddy, Shaun Mitchell, James Brooks, Lewis Thomas, Christopher Tatnal,{Michael {Brooks, Martin Trathen,} Charles Newman and Antony Brush, with Andrew Lunn as Reserve. We play matches all over Cornwall and it is very interesting. One day we hope to make the First Team.
